mode_reasoning: All 21 test failures are in the contract test domain with a shared root cause pattern (404 errors). High file overlap expected in test configuration, security setup, and base test classes. Sequential debugging is more effective for infrastructure issues than parallel execution. Single developer can iterate faster on test configuration.
original_requirements: Fix all test failures in stock-monitor backend to reach 100% test passing (183/183). Current state: 162 passing, 21 failures, 9 skipped. Priority 1: Fix 15 contract test failures with 404 errors. Priority 2: Fix 6 other contract test failures (JSON path errors, status code mismatches). Priority 3: Address 9 skipped tests in MonthEndWorkflowTest.
all_tasks: T1: Run full test suite and analyze failure patterns
T2: Investigate root cause of 404 errors in contract tests (endpoint registration, routing, security)
T3: Fix contract test configuration to ensure endpoints are properly registered
T4: Fix JSON path failures (missing data in API responses)
T5: Fix status code mismatches (validation and error handling)
T6: Address 9 skipped tests in MonthEndWorkflowTest (transaction visibility)
T7: Verify all 183 tests pass with mvn -o clean test
T8: Document root causes and fixes applied

task_groups.name: Fix All Contract and Workflow Test Failures
tasks: T1: Run full test suite and analyze failure patterns
T2: Investigate root cause of 404 errors in contract tests

execution_phases.description: Sequential execution to fix all test failures systematically
